description:
Do you dig the feeling of flannel fabric but wish it was a bit more lightweight? They feel that, and they think you should feel their Los Feliz Flannel. Trust prAna, it's as light as they come, while still keeping that iconic flannel style.

Made from a totally sustainable blend of organic cotton and recycled polyester, the Los Feliz is as responsible as it is comfortable. And thanks to that lightweight texture, it's perfect all on it's own or layed up.

Plus, they added some details to take it to the next level. Like triangle patches you'll find on the side seams, and a classic chest pocket on the left side. And of course, thanks to its standard fit, this style always brings the classic charm.
name: Prana Los Feliz Flannel Shirt - Standard - Mens
